# removeItems(items)

**Instance Method**

Removes a collection of annotations, overlays, or other item collections from the map.

## Declaration

```swift
removeItems(items: (Overlay | Annotation)[]): (Annotation | Overlay)[];
```

## Parameters

- **items**: An array of annotations, overlays, or the data returned from [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/importGeoJSON] to display on the map.

## Return Value

Returns an array of items removed from the map.

## Discussion

This method doesn’t change the map’s visible region. Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/showItems] with a list of items to focus on to update the map’s view.

## Adding and removing geographical features

- **addItems(items)**: Adds a collection of annotations, overlays, or other item collections to the map.

items.description: Adds a collection of annotations, overlays, or other item collections to the map.
